evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Alex expressed overwhelm balancing internship applications with coursework and insecurity about resume quality for competitive museum positions. Solutions offered included reframing academic projects as relevant experience, time-blocking strategies, and resume preparation techniques. Alex responded positively by identifying transferable skills from campus exhibition curation and archival work, immediately drafting bullet points, and scheduling concrete next steps. Progress is evidenced by reduced self-doubt, actionable planning for Thursday's meeting, and adoption of self-care reminders.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Alex expressed overwhelm balancing internship applications with coursework and fear about inadequate museum experience. Solutions included time blocking, reframing campus projects as professional experience (art exhibition curation, archival transcription), and portfolio development. Alex accepted these by identifying transferable skills, preparing experience bullet points, and scheduling a Thursday meeting to review materials. Progress shown through concrete action commitments (photos, notes), articulated strengths ("visual storytelling"), and accountability for planner use and breaks.

evolution_stages.conversation_summary: Problems discussed: 1) Balancing internship applications with academic workload, 2) Self-doubt about resume quality for competitive positions, 3) Difficulty implementing time management strategies. Solutions offered/accepted: 1) Reframing campus experiences as relevant qualifications, 2) Creating video application materials showcasing skills, 3) Time-blocking with 30-minute focused sessions. Student's response: Positively identified transferable skills (exhibition curation, research transcription), scheduled concrete actions (video filming, bullet point preparation), and demonstrated initiative (walking brainstorming session). Evidence of progress: Shifted from self-doubt to recognizing own qualifications, created actionable plan for application enhancement, and showed increased confidence through proactive behaviors.
